General.Name: Shentong Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shentong Technology Group Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells automotive parts in China. It offers car power parts, such as air duct, pressure tube, intake manifold, and oil pan and separator; car interior part, including truck trim, console, and inner column; and exterior part, such as bottom guard, deflector system, and sink and cover system. The company also provides car highlights comprising charging pile, sunroof, front and rear triangular window, PC glass, and smart outer column; and cup holder, glove box, and inner door handle. Shentong Technology Group Co., Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Yuyao, China.
General.Address: No. 788, Tanjialing West Road, Yuyao, China, 315402
